Docs.summary: Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is pressed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnApplyTemplate() cil managed

Docs.summary: Builds the visual tree for the when a new template is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer OnCreateAutomationPeer() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function OnCreateAutomationPeer () As AutomationPeer

Docs.summary: Creates a new object for this control.
Docs.returns: A new automation peer object for this control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnGotKeyboardFocus(class System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnGotKeyboardFocus (e As KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs)

Docs.summary: Provides class handling for the routed event.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.IsSelected%2A> property to `true` for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> that this header belongs to when this header gets keyboard focus.
This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> event data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnKeyDown(class System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnKeyDown (e As KeyEventArgs)

Docs.summary: Provides class handling for the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method attempts to move the focus to the first element in the tab when the DOWN ARROW key is pressed on the tab header. If successful, it marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnKeyTipAccessed(class System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipAccessedEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnKeyTipAccessed (e As KeyTipAccessedEventArgs)
abstract member OnKeyTipAccessed : System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipAccessedEventArgs -> unit override this.OnKeyTipAccessed : System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipAccessedEventArgs -> unit

Docs.summary: Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is accessed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseLeftButtonDown(class System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseLeftButtonDown (e As MouseButtonEventArgs)

Docs.summary: Notifies the of a mouse left button down event on this tab header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnRender(class System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext drawingContext) cil managed

Docs.param: The drawing instructions for a specific element. This context is provided to the layout system.
Docs.summary: Participates in rendering operations that are directed by the layout system. The rendering instructions for this element are not used directly when this method is invoked, and are instead preserved for later asynchronous use by layout and drawing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This override calls the base <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRender%2A> method, and then ensures that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> is completely rendered before the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.TabHeaderLeft%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.TabHeaderRight%2A> properties are calculated.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Ribbon As Ribbon
public: property System::Windows::Controls::Ribbon::Ribbon ^ Ribbon { System::Windows::Controls::Ribbon::Ribbon ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a reference to the that this control belongs to.
Docs.value: A reference to the that this control belongs to. The registered default is . For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is set on the parent control and is inherited by the child controls. It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the class. ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
